description: There is no parade and the audience is kept socially distanced amid the ongoing pandemic.
title: Bastille Day: France honours health workers amid pandemic
title_page: Bastille Day: France honours health workers amid pandemic - BBC News
maintext: Traditional fireworks by the Eiffel Tower will take place at 23:00 local time (22:00 BST) as a "symbol of the resilience of our capital and our nation and a tribute to all the everyday heroes who worked during the duration of the epidemic", a joint press release by city officials said.
